await BetZilla.marketCount()

q
cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network localhost
q
pkill -f "hardhat node" && pkill -f "npm start" && pkill -f "node index.js"
q
npx hardhat compile
q

q

q

console.log('Bet for account:', await BetZilla.bets(2, "0xf39fd6e51aad88f6f4ce6ab8827279cfffb92266"));
console.log('Market 2:', await BetZilla.markets(2));
